claim: Inferno does not star Tom Hanks as Robert Langdon.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Tom Hanks portrays Langdon in the Robert Langdon film series , starting with the 2006 film adaptation of The Da Vinci Code , reprising the role in the 2009 film adaptation of Angels & Demons , and again in the 2016 film adaptation of Inferno .
